snippet: President Obama for a second time converted the White House public rooms into a science fair on Tuesday, and announced new federal and private-sector initiatives to encourage "a nation of tinkerers and dreamers" in science, technology, engineering...
abstract: President Obama for a second time converted the White House public rooms into a science fair on Tuesday, and announced new federal and private-sector initiatives to encourage "a nation of tinkerers and dreamers" in science, technology, engineering and math.

headline.main: Obama Announces Education Initiatives at White House Science Fair
